name: Keeping Time - incomplete
description:
You must have a controller to play this game.

Rotate the thumb sticks to rotate the clock hands. 

Alternatively, an .apk can be downloaded, but the touch controls are temperamental. 

 The idea was for a beat based rhythm game themed around stopping an alarm clock going off, Not quite complete, but maybe you'll see the rough idea. Match the hands of the clock to score points.

Created during the 1-6 Game Jam organised by indie Game Squad.

Credits:

Elevator To Freedom (ID 451) - Remastered by Lobo Loco, available from: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Lobo_Loco/my-favorite-easy-listening-lo-fi-co... under https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/
